reviews.review_msg: If you ever come across a class taught by Everton, TAKE IT!! You won't regret it! He's a genuinely great guy who cares a LOT about you and your success in class. Most approachable prof I've ever had. A bit of a tough marker on writing, but he will teach you good strategies you can use. His feedback is in depth & helps you with the next assignment!

my fav prof. It would be a crime to go though your undergrad without taking Everton at least once because he is a gift to SFU. He will teach you skills that you can actually apply to your studies while also providing interesting content. He is a tough but fair marker and gives great feedback.

Mike Everton is the best English prof around. My first assignment did not do so well, but Everton took the time with me to better my writing. At first, it was frustrating but it was worth the time because he really helped me improve. When you see Everton is teaching a course, you better enroll in it. Trust me!
